string.name: name
string.value: The One Who Walks Down Memory Lane2

As #p2140000# said, I was able to pass #m270010100# and go all the way to #m270010200#. But I couldn't move beyond that... I thought I was given permission, what's going on? I'm going to have to complain to #b#p2140000##k.

He said the permission he gave me was only up to #m270010200#, and that if I wanted to go in further, I would have to prove myself for that as well. When I told him that I definitely want to explore more, he said to go to #b#m270010200##k this time and defeat #r999 #o8200002##k... \n\n#o8200002# #r#a35021##k

I defeated 999 #o8200002#. #p2140000# was once again impressed and granted me permission. I get a feeling that this permission is only good up to #m270010300#. If I want to go in further, will I have to prove my strength again?

Did you get to explore #m270010200#? You probably weren't able to go further than that. That's because the permission I gave you was only up to #m270010200#. You only proved you had enough strength to go to #m270010200#, therefore you can't go beyond that.
If you want to go in further, you have to take another test. Is that what you want? Are you up for it?
Then go to #b#m270010200##k and defeat the #r#o8200002##k. If you defeat #r999#k of them, I will grant you permission to go beyond that.
That's too hard for you? That's too bad then. I guess you reached your limit.
You've defeated 999 #o8200002#. That's amazing. I will grant you permission as promised.
#dAs the representative of Rhinne, the Goddess of Time, I grant you permission to look back at your 3rd memory.
Go on. You should be able to go up till #b#m270010300##k. As you may have guessed, you can't go beyond that. If you want to go further... you'll have to take a new test.
You haven't defeated #r999 #o8200002##k yet. I don't think you are strong enough to walk against the flow of the past yet.
